医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
社会隔离的变化与死亡、残疾和痴呆风险增加相关研究人员评估了美国老年居民的社会孤立与健康结果（例如认知和身体功能下降、心血管疾病、中风和死亡率）之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Social-isolation-change-linked-with-increased-risk-of-mortality-disability-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Social-isolation-change-linked-with-increased-risk-of-mortality-disability-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06f5dca9-02c9-4090-9f83-5bac2e961ee7 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 06:16:00 -0400 Social isolation change associated with increased risk of mortality, disability, and dementia
澳大利亚联盟敦促在国际自我保健日投入 600 万美元用于数字健康评级今天，澳大利亚自我保健联盟（简称联盟）与国际社会一起纪念国际自我保健日，并再次呼吁联邦政府拨款 600 万美元，资助数字健康信息和服务的“健康星级评级”系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Australiae28099s-Alliance-urges-246M-for-digital-health- ratings-on-International-Self-Care-Day.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Australiae28099s-Alliance-urges-246M-for-digital-health- ratings-on-International-Self-Care-Day.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e6323b0-72e0-4c25-9b5c-7c70c04a5470 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 04:12:00 -0400 Australia’s Alliance urges $6M for digital health ratings on International Self-Care Day
新研究揭示结直肠癌细胞如何建立肝转移苏黎世联邦理工学院的研究人员发现了结直肠癌细胞如何在肝脏中定植。他们的发现可能会为未来抑制这一过程开辟新的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-study-reveals-how-colorectal-cancer-cells-built-liver-metastases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-study-reveals-how-colorectal-cancer-cells-built-liver-metastases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a443e3f-60b1-4e84-b0cb-7575b29557c8 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 04:09:00 -0400 New study reveals how colorectal cancer cells establish liver metastases
为研究人员带来革命性的肝细胞计数在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 DeNovix 的 Dan Schieffer 讨论了为 CellDrop 开发的新应用程序，以及它如何彻底改变药物发现行业的肝细胞计数等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Revolutionizing-hepatatory-count-for-researchers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Revolutionizing-hepatatory-count-for-researchers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5de60b8-7bcb-4a63-90c9-39564bb3e7f4 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 04:08:00 -0400 Revolutionizing hepatocyte count for researchers
药剂师警告不要自我用药以降低痴呆风险“根据英国国民医疗服务体系（NHS）发布的最新数据，英国痴呆症诊断率创历史新高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Pharmacist-cautions-against-self-medicating-with-ozempic-for-dementia-risk-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Pharmacist-cautions-against-self-medicating-with-ozempic-for-dementia-risk-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72d4d4ff-b342-4003-8af1-87ef964a99b5 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 04:00:00 -0400 Pharmacist cautions against self-medicating with ozempic for dementia risk reduction
研究人员将尝试突破性的先兆子痫筛查测试研究人员将尝试一项突破性的先兆子痫筛查测试，先兆子痫是一种可能危及孕妇及其未出生婴儿生命的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Researchers-to-trial-ground-breaking-screening-test-for-pre-eclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Researchers-to-trial-ground-breaking-screening-test-for-pre-eclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=734352e4-290e-43f7-a5e8-8ac9e43fba50 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 03:58:00 -0400 Researchers to trial ground-breaking screening test for pre-eclampsia
突破性研究表明人工智能数字程序与人类焦虑疗法一样有效ieso Digital Health 与 NHS 和 NIHR BioResource 合作进行的一项新研究表明，其人工智能驱动的数字程序所提供的结果可与传统的人类主导的广泛性焦虑疗法相媲美。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Breakthrough-study-shows-AI-digital-program-as- effective-as- human-therapy-for-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Breakthrough-study-shows-AI-digital-program-as- effective-as- human-therapy-for-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1736cf19-eed0-46f1-8a2d-f2ed6265d2ec Mon, 29 Jul 2024 03:55:00 -0400 Breakthrough study shows AI digital program as effective as human therapy for anxiety
NHS 面临 O 型血严重短缺，发布琥珀警报最近的网络攻击影响了伦敦的医院，并且由于城镇和城市中心的献血中心大量未完成的预约而减少了收集量，导致医院对 O 型血的需求增加，导致血液库存下降到前所未有的水平。低水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Amber-alert-issued-as-NHS-faces-ritic-shortage-of-O-type-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Amber-alert-issued-as-NHS-faces-ritic-shortage-of-O-type-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dceeadd-06af-4844-adf9-5d0ca90a16dd Mon, 29 Jul 2024 03:47:00 -0400 Amber alert issued as NHS faces critical shortage of O type blood
新的数据催化剂计划极大推动了运动神经元疾病研究英国健康数据研究中心 (HDR UK) 和英国痴呆平台 (DPUK) 领导的新数据催化剂的形成将大大推动对缩短寿命的神经系统疾病运动神经元疾病 (MND) 的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Motor-neurone-disease-research-receives-major-boost-through-new-data-catalyst-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Motor-neurone-disease-research-receives-major-boost-through-new-data-catalyst-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ea90496-03ca-471b-a659-ace889914702 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 03:43:00 -0400 Motor neurone disease research receives major boost through new data catalyst initiative
加拿大专家敦促谨慎对待免费基因检测和数据共享作者在 CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）上指出，由行业部分或全部补贴提供的免费基因检测可能需要权衡，加拿大的卫生系统必须仔细权衡潜在的临床、伦理和法律考虑因素，以保护患者数据。评论https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.231588。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Canadian-experts-urge-caution-on-free-genic-testing-and-data-sharing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Canadian-experts-urge-caution-on-free-genic-testing-and-data-sharing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f48a5a73-61f2-492f-acb0-68ca8ea623ae Mon, 29 Jul 2024 01:56:04 -0400 Canadian experts urge caution on free genetic testing and data sharing
